resources.string: This is the time that passes between TSIS tries to upload new data to the TSIS server in minutes.
You can limit the maximum location accuracy drift by setting this option in meters. Please note that setting this value too low will likely result in too few points.
By setting this option you can set a minimum of time that has to pass between two points in seconds that will be recorded.
According to the previous preference this is the minimum difference between two points in meters.
Please enter the URL of your TSIS server.
Host could not be recognized as an URL (schema: http(s)://www.somehost)!
Please enter your TSIS user name here.
Please enter your TSIS password here.
